transcript.title: Appointment of Departmental Secretaries
transcript.content:
I am pleased to announce the re-appointment of Mr Roger Beale, Mr Andrew Podger, and Dr Neil Johnston to their respective positions as Secretary of the Department of the Environment and Heritage, Secretary of the Department of Health and Aged Care and Secretary of the Department of Veterans' Affairs when their current appointments expire on 10 March 2001.

The new appointments will be for periods of three years.

1 March 2001
